sentences.sContent: When you read the testimony and examine the data, legalisation seems more of a present to a pimp and a trafficker than the courage and pragmatism of an enlightened society.
sentences.sContent_eng: When you read the testimony and examine the data, legalisation seems more of a present to a pimp and a trafficker than the courage and pragmatism of an enlightened society.
sentences.sCn: 当你阅读证词和检视数据时，你会发现与一个开明社会的勇气和实用主义相比，卖淫合法化更像是给予皮条客和贩子的一份礼物。

sentences.sContent: While those sex workers were in some respects voluntarily participating, the pimp admitted to using extortion, violence and drugs to get these very young women to cooperate.
sentences.sContent_eng: While those sex workers were in some respects voluntarily participating, the pimp admitted to using extortion, violence and drugs to get these very young women to cooperate.
sentences.sCn: 在某种程度上，这些性工作者是自愿参加的。 但是皮条客承认也会使用勒索，暴力，和毒品来迫使这些年轻女性进行合作。

sentences.sContent: The driver's window rolls down, and a female pimp — known by the girls, almost lovingly, as a Mamachka — leans inside to negotiate a price.
sentences.sContent_eng: The driver's window rolls down, and a female pimp — known by the girls, almost lovingly, as a Mamachka — leans inside to negotiate a price.
sentences.sCn: 车窗摇了下来，车内的女皮条客斜着身子倚着车窗和女孩们谈着价儿。 车里的这个女人就是他们熟知的“琦卡妈咪”。

trans.tranOther: a man who makes money by controlling  prostitute s
